name: Script.etvguide
tagline: Modified version of script.tvguide for xbmc. This version is mainly focused for WEEB.TV polish online television.
body:
### General
This script is compatible with KODI version 14 and 13. The best way is to download the repository [HERE](https://github.com/en0x/script.etvguide/blob/master/zip/repository.etvguide/repository.etvguide-1.0.5.zip?raw=true) or if you want to you can go to https://github.com/en0x/script.etvguide and fork my project or create a pull request with fixes or features. 

### Contact
You can contact me at pawelkilian+etvguide@gmail.com with any comments or changes.

Thanks
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
